Alternative Splicing

Source: R/functions.R
spliceQTL-package.Rd

This R package includes various functions for applying the global test of alternative splicing. Some functions only work on the virtual machine (see below).

See also

Prepare BBMRI and Geuvadis data:

  • get.snps.geuvadis (not VM)

  • get.snps.bbmri (only VM)

  • get.exons.geuvadis (only VM)

  • get.exons.bbmri (only VM)

Process samples and covariates:

  • match.samples

  • adjust.samples

  • adjust.variables

Search for exons and SNPs:

  • map.genes

  • map.exons

  • map.snps

  • drop.trivial

Test for alternative splicing:

  • test.single

  • test.multiple

  • See also
